subject: Automobiles
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Three laps from the finish, Tony Stewart went too wide into a corner, Kevin Harvick stormed inside and went on to win the Nascar Nextel Cup.
snippet: Three laps from the finish, Tony Stewart went too wide into a corner, Kevin Harvick stormed inside and went on to win the Nascar Nextel Cup.
